Text:
Thanks AMIABLE for the encoding and Drarbg for sharing! A must have for cinefiles (not only for Zeffirelli's fans). I'm glad that the blu-ray releases give the younger the opportunity "to meet the classics", and to us the older ones to view once more the films that crystallized our cinematographic culture.
